VitePress Configuration Tool

Cross-platform client

Supported operating systems include Windows and macOS.

Visual configuration

Visualization interface configuration

Native parsing

The configuration reading and writing directly parse the original configuration file of vitepress, without relying on third-party data storage.

multilingual

Support multi-language configuration

sidebar identification

Automatically identify folders and article lists and generate sidebars

Markdown editor

The program has built-in markdown editor, which allows document editing within the program
